channel.description: Week 12 Announcements Coming Up Lab 6 Quizzes Friday Lab 6 Next Friday Lab 6 File Servers Drive Mappings Application Servers Working Web Apps Lab 7 Backups Monitoring DevOps - Webhooks Logging Lab 7 Grading No Meeting Required 1: Zip File & Readme 2: Monitoring URL 3: GitLab/GitHub & URL 4: Writeup Final Project Build Something or Fix Something Web Resource for New Startup Set up Laptops for a School Design Central Auth for Company Thin Clients vs. Thick in Labs Chat with me for ideas Final Project Completion Written Report - Use Template Research, Propose & SWOT Analysis Include Graphics & Data As Needed Presentation - ~15 minutes Convince Me You've Analyzed It Well Small Prototype - Should be Easy Spend 2-4 Hours on Prototype Presentation Pre-recorded Video Upload to Canvas or OneDrive Keep in Touch! Ed Discussion Discord & Teams "Tea Time" Office Hours One-on-One Office Hours
